msgExit: Do you really want to exit?
msgGlobal:
We are sorry. A global exception was detected.
Please open an issue on either Github or JIRA providing the projects ID - we will have a look asap.
msgBrowserNotSupported:
This application makes use of html5 features but is tested to be compatible with the latest versions of all common browsers.
We are sorry, but your browser does not meet the minimal requirements to run this application.
Please try again using another browser.
msgMobileRestrictions:
Due to mobile browser restrictions you have to confirm that this application is allowed to download/cache/show/play images and audio/video content required in the requested project.

There is currently NO official support for mobile devices - this is an experimental preview only! So please do NOT file bugs until there is an official release available.
msgProjectNotFound:
We are sorry.
The project you are requesting could not be found on our server. Please make sure you are using a valid Project ID.
msgProjectNotValid:
We are sorry.
The project you are requesting has an invalid file structure or missing resources.
Details:
msgParser:
We are sorry.
The project you are requesting could not be parsed correctly on our server. Please open an issue on either Github or Jira providing the projects ID- we will have a look asap.
msgInternalServer: We are sorry. The latest request caused an internal server error.
msgServerConnection:
Error connecting our server or server not responding.
Please make sure you are connected to the internet.
If your connection was temporarily unavailable please click 'Retry' to resend the request.
msgUnsupportedSound:
We have detected a sound file (or codec) that is not compatible with your current browser.
You can run the project anyway - unsupported sounds will be ignored.
msgUnsupportedDevice:
The requested project makes use of device features currently not supported in our player and/or not available on your device/current browser.
You can run the project anyway- unsupported features will be ignored.
